structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
URBAN SERVICES DISTRICTS -- AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Dissolution of multicounty or multicity districts.
law.text: Multicounty or multicity districts may be dissolved when each member county or city follows procedures defined in KRS 108.160.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1980; and ch. 119, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec. 10.

metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by two 1980 acts which do not appear to be in conflict and have been compiled together.
